meanings.definition: Fraps (verb): to capture a screenshot or video of a computer screen
meanings.sent1: I will fraps the game screen to show my friends my high score.
meanings.sent2: Remember to fraps the important parts of the presentation for reference later.
meanings.sent3: He tried to fraps the cat's funny antics on the computer screen.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a fraps, freezing that moment in time forever.
meanings.sent5: The fraps of the sunset was so clear, it felt like you could touch it.

meanings.sent1: I downloaded a new fraps to record my gameplay videos.

meanings.sent3: The fraps icon on the desktop always made her smile.

meanings.sent1: The fraps settings need to be adjusted for better video quality.
